Docs.summary: Gets the number of sample entries contained in the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing the number of sample entries contained in the current instance.
Docs.remarks: The first few children of the current instance (equaling "EntryCount") will be of type or a subclass depending on the handler type.

Docs.summary: Gets the offset of the data after box specific information is accounted for.
Docs.value: A specifying the seek position at which the data starts.

MemberSignature.Value: public IsoSampleDescriptionBox (TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.IsoHandlerBox handler);

Docs.param: A containing information about the new instance, including the position at which to read.
A to containing the box to read.
A to use as a handler for the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of by reading the contents from a file.
This class provides access to ISO/IEC 14496-12 SampleDescriptionBoxes.
